brigade.title: Brigade

promoteBrigade.confirm: Are you sure you want to promote this brigadier to one of the brigade leaders?
promoteBrigade.feedback: Congratulations, your team has one more brigadier as brigade leader.

approveBrigade.confirm: Are you sure you want to approve this to be a brigade?
approveBrigade.feedback: Congratulations, your team has increased with one more brigadier!

requestEnter.confirm: Are you sure you want to send an application to the brigade leader?
requestEnter.feedback: Your request has been submitted and is awaiting approval from the brigade leader.

leaveBrigade.confirm: Are you sure you want to leave your squad? By doing this you will lose control if you are a leader.

new.title: New Brigade
new.warning: Your brigade was created! Our team will review your information and we will soon approve to become part of our network!

brigade.update: Your brigade has been updated successfully!

fire.title: View Fire
fire.chooseLocation: Click on the map to report the location of the fire

new.title: Report Fire
new.fieldTitle: Name (eg Fire in Joaquin Miller Park)

user.title: Welcome to the Civilian Brigadist application! Enter your email and password.
user.name: Your name

login.title: Could not login
login.subTitle: Your username or password is incorrect! If you have not registered yet, do it now!

new.title: Register
new.error: It was not possible to register because your email already exists in our database or there was an error, please contact us.

recover.title: Recover Password
recover.confirm: Are you sure you want to receive a password recovery email in the email
recover.response: We've sent you an email with the steps to change your password.
recover.changed: Your password has been successfully changed, you can use it to sign in.

update.title: Profile
update.error: We were unable to change your profile because your email already exists in our database or there was an error, please contact us.

chooseOptionFail: Please select an option to continue.
connectionFail: Likely problem with your internet, please try again.
generalError: We had an error during your request
name: Name
title: Title
